name: 1Code
description: Open-source Cursor-like UI for Claude Code that enables running multiple Claude Code agents in parallel. Features include diff previews, built-in git client, git worktree support for isolated agent execution, and plan/agent modes. Available on Mac (local execution with worktrees) and Web (remote sandboxes with live previews).
community_quotes: #1 Product of the Day January 16 2026 with 506 upvotes
Claude Code finally has a usable UI
Runs multiple Claude Codes in parallel dramatically sped up development

name: Blink Agent Builder
description: The world's fastest AI app builder and first vibe coding platform that builds AI agents. Turn any idea into a beautiful, fully working app in seconds from a simple prompt. Demonstrated capability to rebuild Cursor, Perplexity, and Shortcut with no code required.
community_quotes: First vibe coding platform for AI agents
Can rebuild complex apps like Cursor and Perplexity

name: Mastra
description: TypeScript AI agent framework from the team behind GatsbyJS. Reached 1.0 stable production release with features including workflows, memory management, streaming, tool-calling agents, agent networks, and workflow orchestration.

name: Redlight Greenlight for Claude Code
description: Native macOS menu bar application that displays Claude Code permission requests in a floating overlay, allowing developers to accept or reject requests from anywhere on their Mac without switching to the terminal. Streamlines the Claude Code workflow by eliminating terminal context switching.
community_quotes: Eliminates need to switch to terminal for permission prompts
